Name: Reclaim Tokens
Description:
Missed certain challenges or rewards? You can redeem them in the Reclaim Hub​ using Reclaim Tokens.
The Reclaim Hub​ will stock items based on the rewards you've won from various activities. If you don't have enough points to redeem all of the week's compensatory rewards, you'll earn bonus Reclaim Tokens proportionally when earning Honor Coins through activities.
The weekly limit resets every Monday at 05:00(UTC-2).
Weekly Reclaim Token Limit: {*val1*}/{*val2*}
